parameters.query:
SELECT cpv2.id, cpv2.position_number, cpv2.title, cpv2.title_tr,
  cpv2.title_pl, cpv2.title_ro, cpv2.title_ru
FROM catalog_positions_v2 cpv2
WHERE cpv2.title IS NOT NULL AND cpv2.title != ''
ORDER BY cpv2.position_number
LIMIT 200;
